summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Brand Campaign Reports Dashboard feature. All 3 backend endpoints (Metrics, Demographics, Applicants) pass 25/25 tests. Frontend UI testing confirms all 3 report tabs work correctly with proper data display, filters, and navigation.

issues: Cookie banner persists across page reloads even after localStorage.setItem('cookiesAccepted', 'all') - may need to check cookie banner logic

critical_code_review_comments: Demographics data is MOCKED/simulated based on campaign category rather than actual platform insights - this is documented and expected
All 3 report endpoints properly require authentication (401 for unauthenticated requests)
All 3 report endpoints properly return 404 for invalid campaign IDs
Platform filter correctly filters metrics by platform (TikTok/Instagram)
Applicants are correctly sorted by DOT% descending
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data - 2 metrics records and 6 confirmed applicants for campaign e31c0c3b-59ca-46f7-9fd8-270301b3ba4e
context_for_next_testing_agent: Brand Campaign Reports feature is fully functional. Test campaign 'AVENUE Summer Collection 2025' (ID: e31c0c3b-59ca-46f7-9fd8-270301b3ba4e) has 2 TikTok metrics and 6 confirmed applicants. Demographics endpoint returns MOCKED data based on campaign category. All backend tests are in /app/tests/test_brand_reports.py.

metrics_report.details: Shows Views, Reach, Likes, Comments, Shares, Saves, Watch Time, Interaction Rate, Retention Rate per creator

demographics_report.details: Shows gender distribution (68% female, 28% male, 4% other), age ranges (13-17 to 55+), country distribution (Paraguay 82%)

applicants_report.details: Shows 6 confirmed creators with avg metrics, rating, level (ROOKIE/TRUSTED/PRO/ELITE), DOT%, avg delay

platform_filter.details: TikTok filter shows 2 metrics, Instagram filter shows 0 (correct - all data is TikTok)

date_filter.details: Histórico Total dropdown available with monthly options

navigation.details: Reportes button from BrandCampaigns page works, back link to Mis Campañas works

mocked_apis.demographics_endpoint: Demographics data is generated/simulated based on campaign category rather than aggregating real platform insights
